price: 14. They said: "If a wolf devours him, while we are a strong group (to guard him), then surely, we are the losers."
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِنۡ أَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in akalahu al-dhi'bu wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun innā idhan lakhāsirūna
